description: Provide high-quality, compassionate nursing care within a busy Emergency Department. Triage, stabilize and manage acute presentations in collaboration with the multidisciplinary clinical team.
responsibilities: Perform triage and initial assessment; provide emergency care and medication administration; insert IVs and manage lines; document patient encounters in EMR; handover and coordinate with physicians and allied health; participate in resuscitation and trauma calls; maintain infection control and patient safety standards.
